intent_atoms.description: No active research tasks beyond the items listed below.
Define ParseIssue Model to underpin tolerant parsing mode.
ParseIssue model implemented and documented in Summary_of_Work.md and planning resources in DOCS/AI/Tolerance_Parsing/README.md.
VoiceOver Regression Pass for Accessibility Shortcuts is blocked without hardware.
Run manual VoiceOver verification on macOS and iPadOS to confirm new focus command menu announces controls and restores focus targets as expected.
Real-World Assets task is blocked awaiting external licensing approvals.

functional_units.name: ParseIssue Model Definition
functional_units.description: Defines the structured corruption event model ParseIssue to support tolerant parsing mode.

functional_units.name: VoiceOver Regression Pass for Accessibility Shortcuts
functional_units.description: Manual VoiceOver verification on macOS and iPadOS hardware to confirm focus command menu announcements and focus target restoration.

functional_units.name: Real-World Assets Licensing
functional_units.description: Securing licensing for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG-H fixtures to replace synthetic payloads and refresh regression baselines.

functional_units.name: Snapshot & CLI Fixture Maintenance
functional_units.description: Refreshing snapshots and CLI fixtures when schema updates occur using ISOINSPECTOR_REGENERATE_SNAPSHOTS environment variable and swift test command.
